reporting-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

title.narrative: Direct Multilateral Contribution to support the implementation of WFP CUBA COUNTRY PROGRAMME 2015-2018

description.narrative: Sostenere e rafforzare la sostenibilità e l'efficienza delle reti di sicurezza alimentare per i gruppi vulnerabili in 34 comuni del paese, in particolare attraverso l'attuazione del piano nazionale per la prevenzione e il controllo dell'anemia, attraverso: un aumento della disponibilità dei dati sui disturbi nutrizionali in gruppi vulnerabili; la prevenzione delle carenze di micronutrienti (soprattutto di ferro) che producono l'anemia nei gruppi vulnerabili con un focus particolare sui bambini tra 6-23 mesi e le donne incinte e che allattano; rafforzamento delle capacità di educazione alimentare, promuovere il cambiamento nelle abitudini nutrizionali la prevenzione dell'anemia - specialmente tra gli scolari e gli adolescenti; sostenendo gli sforzi del governo nel rafforzare la sicurezza alimentare nazionale e sistema di monitoraggio nutrizionale (SISVAN).

To support national efforts to strengthen the sustainability and efficiency of food-based safety nets for vulnerable groups in 34 municipalities of the country, particularly trough the implementation of the National Plan for the Prevention and Control of Anaemia by: increasing the availability of data on nutritional disorders in vulnerable groups; preventing micronutrient-deficiencies (especially iron-deficiency) that lead to anaemia in vulnerable groups with a particular focus on children aged 6-23 months and pregnant and lactating women; strengthening capacities on nutritional education, promoting change in nutritional habits the prevention of anemia - particularly among schoolchildren and adolescents; supporting Government's efforts in strengthening the national Food Security and Nutrition Monitoring System (SISVAN).

organisation.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

tag.narrative: By 2030, end all forms of malnutrition, including achieving, by 2025, the internationally agreed targets on stunting and wasting in children under 5 years of age, and address the nutritional needs of adolescent girls, pregnant and lactating women and older persons
End hunger, achieve food security and improved nutrition and promote sustainable agriculture
Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages
Strengthen the capacity of all countries, in particular developing countries, for early warning, risk reduction and management of national and global health risks
